result.execSummary:
The defendant Cleveland G Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Cleveland G Robinson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Cleveland G Robinson was found guilty of Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams) [Modifiers: Second and Subsequent Offense], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(h)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Cleveland G Robinson in court with attorney Leonie Dolch.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waiver of Right to Prelim filed, Court accepts Waiver, probable cause found, bound over, Information filed, waives reading, Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 1, Judgment to be entered, Ct. 2 dismissed, Court withholds sentence, probation 2 years, 20 days jail w/Huber, may serve sentence in Milwaukee County, Jail start date 3/12/16 at 7:00 P.M., $518.00 costs, defendant to provide DNA Sample, AODA and comply, firearms restriction, 2 days sentence credit,
